generated_body: In this article, the user is likely to find an exploration of the historical significance of the car at the center of the Ford v Ferrari rivalry during the Le Mans '66 race. It may detail the technical specifications and unique features of this lesser-known vehicle, drawing parallels to the more famous competitors in the race. Additionally, the piece could provide context about the impact of this rivalry on automotive culture and its portrayal in recent media, particularly in relation to the film "Ford v Ferrari." Overall, it aims to shed light on a pivotal moment in motorsport history that is often overshadowed by more prominent narratives.
